article: israel 's un envoy dan gillerman on thursday relayed his country 's request for iran 's expulsion from the united nations after iranian president mahmoud ahmadinejad suggested that israel be `` wiped off the map '' .
abstract: envoy presses for iran expulsion from un over anti-israel comments
